label: 開帳
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: Temple fairs featuring the display of a sacred object that was usually kept from view. When the object was from another temple, this fair was known as degaicho. Many popular forms of entertainment could be found at the sites of such unveilings."［出開帳］"
